text: Idol 2018 is the fourteenth season of Swedish Idol. This season is broadcast on TV4, as were earlier seasons. The hosts and the judges remained the same from the previous season. For the first time in the shows history there was a Top 13. Sebastian Walldén won the final. ==Elimination chart == {|class="wikitable" align="center" |colspan="2" align="right"|Stadium: | align="Center" bgcolor="#cccccc" colspan="6" |Semi Finals |colspan="12" Result |-style="background:Gold;" |1 |Sebastian Walldén |"Back to Black" |3 |"Without You" |5 |"Everything" | Winner |-style="background:Silver;" | 2 | Kadiatou Holm Keita | "Say Something" |4 |"We Found Love" |6 |"Everything" |Runner-Up |- |} ==Auditions== *4 March 2018: Karlstad, Karlstad CCC *10 March 2018: Umeå, Väven *18 March 2018: Göteborg, Eriksbergshallen *24 March 2018: Helsingborg, Helsingborg Arena *14 April 2018: Stockholm, Tele2 Arena ==References== Category:Idol (Swedish TV series) Category:2018 in Swedish music Category:2018 Swedish television seasons
